page.title: 11Bideford:S+SE.Dipping.
page.content: I live on a farm in the small parish of Landcross.Iam going to write about 2 of the many events that happen on our farm -sheep dipping and corn harvest.Sheep dipping happens July-Aug.and Sept-Oct.: it is compulsory.We do this to treat scab and maggots.The sheep dip smell al -so keeps the flies away from the sheep This job is very messy:when the sheep are put in the dip there is a small spl -ash,and some ambitious lambs try to run and jump the narrow ledge,nearly al ways falling and making a huge splash. When they fall they go right under so they don't have to be ducked.When you do this job you send a card to the Min -istry of Agriculture saying when and at what time.A man usually comes but some times he can't come. The next thing I shall write about is corn harvest.We do a lot of contracting so time is very precious during___Cont.
